column5: Does anyopne know how to get maps of the many lakes north of red lake ontario? Thanks in advance.

These folks have been getting me maps for several years. Good folks and easy to deal with.Northern Sporting SuppliesBox 830, 231 Howey StreetRed Lake, Ontario PO2MOPhone: 1-807-727-2302Pooch in Central Illinois
Pooch,thanks for the info. I called them and they have the map I was looking for and it's being sent out today. Thanks again. This board is great.duffy
